wpPage.title: The Studio
wpPage.content:
Pocket Audio consists of three rooms: a spacious live room, a production & mixing room and a drum room. All wired together for multi-tracking sessions of all kinds.

  • 16 channel interface
  • UAD preamps
  • A collection of both modern & vintage microphones
  • Focal monitoring system
  • Orange, Fender & Marshall amps
  • Yamaha upright piano
  • Gretsch Renown drum kit / Yamaha Tour custom kit
  • Synthesizers
